text:
@Mike_Pence Your mindlessness to follow a grown child who calls names & teaches everyone how to be truly cruel to those that may have a brain makes you a cult follower and Antichrist!
#BETAwards2020 #COVID19 #BlackLivesMatter #Shameful #Disgraceful #VoterFraud
